question: The Barrah dacoity was the first major venture of the revolutionary terrorist of the freedom movement in which of the following regions?
explanation: The Barrah dacoity was the first major venture of the revolutionary terrorists of the freedom movement in 1908, in Dhaka district of East Bengal. Pulin Behari Das organized the dacoity which was conducted in the day light, when revolutionaries attacked the residence of the Zamindar of Barrah.
